mema kramayedi wiwahawimak sidu nowi lingika sambhandatha athikaraganu labayi.samanya sampradhaya nam charithranukulawa ho nithimaya giwisumak mahin ekata ekwana yuwalak ho pirisak thama lingika awashyathawayath ema charithranukula ho naithika giwisumata yatathwa sidu kirimayi.eheth mema kramayedi wiwahayata path nowi lingika sabadatha pawathwayi.eheth me sadaha nithimaya awasarayak rajaya wisin anumathakala yuthuya.nidahas aalaya atham rajayan wisin anumathakara nithigathakara atha.wisheshayen batahira ratawala mema kramaya wyapthawa pawathi.

jathin athara asamagiya athi kirime aramunen sidu kerena prachandakari kriya pilibandawa awadhanayen sitina lesath ee pilibanda dushamana aaranchi pathuruwa harimen walaki sitina lesath rajaye prawruththi departhamenthuwa mahajanathawagen illa sitiyi.dashaka thunaka yuddhaya nima karamin labuwa wu nidahas wathawaranaya nathi kirimata katayuthu karana deshiya ha wideshiya kumanthranaye yedi sitina balawega jathin athara bheda bhinna kirime kriyawaliye niratha wi sitina me mohothe shri lankawasi siyaluma purawasiyan rate yahapatha ha samaya raka ganime piliwethin kriya kirima yuthukamak bawath antharjathika mattamen rate kirthi namaya nathi kirimatath samajaye kalakolahala athi kara rata anathurata path kirimatath noyekuth balawega kriya karana me awasthawe jathin athara samagiya ha sahajiwanaya athi kirimata upakari wana aakarayen janathawa danumwath kirimata madhyaye purna sahayogaya da rajaye prawruththi departhamenthuwa balaporoththu we.jathika menma paudgalika sampath ha depala winasha karana prajathanthra wirodhi, anthawadi ha thrasthawadi kriyawaliyan pilibandawa hondin awabodha karagena eewayin walaki sitina lesath ewani uthsahayan pilibandawa rajaya danumwath kirimata katayuthu karana lesath mahajanathawagen wadi duratath illa siti.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
